title: Lessons from a never-ending personal project
dot:
digraph G{rankdir=TB;nodesep=0.5;subgraph cluster_0{label="Personal Project Challenges";style=filled;color=lightgrey;a[label="Unclear Goals
(Shifting desires)"];b[label="Unrealistic Deadlines
(Lack of external pressure)"];c[label="Scope Creep
(Project evolves beyond initial vision)"]; a->c;b->c;}d[label="Never-ending Essay
(9 months, 17,000 words)"];c->d[label="Exemplified by"];subgraph cluster_1{label="Lessons Learned";style=filled;color=lightgrey;e[label="Projects are abandoned,
never finished (Valéry)"];f[label="Iterative process leads to
unforeseen improvements"];g[label="Writing as self-discovery
(Bradbury, Twain, Russell)"];h[label="Difficulty of accurately
conveying thoughts"];}d->e;d->f;d->g;d->h;i[label="Appreciation for
completed projects"];{e f g h}->i;}

title: Jepsen: MySQL 8.0.34
dot:
digraph mysql_repeatable_read{rankdir=TB;nodesep=0.5;subgraph cluster_background{label="Background";bgcolor="#f0f0f0";mysql[label="MySQL (InnoDB)", shape=box, style="rounded,filled", fillcolor="#ccf0ff"];oltp[label="OLTP workloads", shape=ellipse];olap_queue[label="OLAP & Queuing", shape=ellipse];replication[label="Replication:
Binlog, Group, NDB
Galera, Percona XtraDB", shape=note];mysql->oltp;mysql->olap_queue;mysql->replication[style=dashed];}subgraph cluster_ansi_sql{label="ANSI SQL Isolation (Flawed)";bgcolor="#f0f0f0";ansi_sql[label="ANSI SQL
Isolation Levels", shape=box, style="rounded,filled", fillcolor="#ffe0cc"];p1[label="P1 (Dirty Read)", shape=ellipse];p2[label="P2 (Non-Repeatable Read)", shape=ellipse];p3[label="P3 (Phantom)", shape=ellipse];critique[label="Berenson et al.
Critique (1995)", shape=note, style=filled, fillcolor="#ffffcc"];p0[label="P0 (Dirty Write)", shape=ellipse, style=dashed];ansi_sql->p1;ansi_sql->p2;ansi_sql->p3;critique->ansi_sql[color="red", constraint=false];critique->p0[color="red", style=dashed, constraint=false];}subgraph cluster_adya{label="Adya's Formalism";bgcolor="#f0f0f0";adya[label="Adya's
Isolation Levels", shape=box, style="rounded,filled", fillcolor="#e0ffe0"];g0[label="G0 (Write Cycle)", shape=ellipse];g1[label="G1
(Aborted/Intermediate/Cyclic Read)", shape=ellipse];g2item[label="G2-item", shape=ellipse];g2[label="G2", shape=ellipse];pl1[label="PL-1 (Read Uncommitted)", shape=plaintext];pl2[label="PL-2 (Read Committed)", shape=plaintext];pl299[label="PL-2.99 (Repeatable Read)", shape=plaintext];pl3[label="PL-3 (Serializable)", shape=plaintext];adya->g0;adya->g1;adya->g2item;adya->g2;g0->pl1[style=invis];pl1->g1[style=invis];g1->pl2[style=invis];pl2->g2item[style=invis];g2item->pl299[style=invis];pl299->g2[style=invis];g2->pl3[style=invis];}subgraph cluster_mysql_issues{label="MySQL Repeatable Read Issues";bgcolor="#f0f0f0";mysql_rr[label="MySQL

Lost Update)", shape=ellipse];nonrepeatable[label="Non-Repeatable Read
(Internal Inconsistency)", shape=ellipse];mav[label="Monotonic Atomic View
Violation", shape=ellipse];rds_serializable[label="RDS Serializable:
Fractured Read-like", shape=ellipse];mysql_rr->g2item_mysql[color="red"];mysql_rr->gsingle[color="red"];mysql_rr->nonrepeatable[color="red"];mysql_rr->mav[color="red"];mysql_rr->rds_serializable[color="red"];}{mysql}->{ansi_sql, adya};{ansi_sql, adya}->{mysql_rr};jepsen[label="Jepsen (Elle)", shape=octagon, style=filled, fillcolor="#c0c0c0"];jepsen->mysql_rr[constraint=false];}
